name: SupportInnesAndTana
_source: speak;Tana;I'm so glad to find you safe!|Everyone back home is worried.|Don't you worry, though.|I'll protect you from now on.
speak;Innes;Tana, what are you doing here?|You have no place on the battlefield.|I want you to return to Castle Frelia immediately.
speak;Tana;Why does everyone say that!?|I am one of Frelia's pegasus knights and a trained soldier!|I studied with Syrene and Vanessa, two of Frelia's finest!
speak;Innes;And you're also a Frelian princess.|You should not be fighting.|What would happen if you were injured?
speak;Innes;Why does she always have to be like this?
speak;Tana;Did you see me out on the battlefield, Innes?
speak;Tana;I knew I made the right decision, coming out here.|I feel like our strategy is becoming much better, as is our fighting.|You do agree, don't you, Innes?
speak;Innes;I grant you some small credit for your achievements on the field of war.|However, I still insist that you return to Frelia.

speak;Innes;It's true that you've gained some experience out on the battlefield.|But your ignorance of the world around you is simply appalling.|It must be tough for a pampered castle brat like you to interact with soldiers.

speak;Tana;If you can say something like that to your own sister, I'm more worried about you.|Even when you're right-and your judgment is good, I know-|you're so blunt that I don't think many people will want to listen to you.
speak;Innes;Never mind about me.|This is about you, Tana.|If you keep traveling with us, someone might take advantage of your naivet?|More than anything, I can't allow that Ephraim to-
speak;Tana;What are you saying?|Do you really think Ephraim and I-
speak;Innes;No.|Even if you're not interested in him in the slightest, I...|I simply do not want to see you get hurt.
speak;Tana;Innes, what are you suggesting?|If that's the way you're going to be, I just won't talk to you anymore!
speak;Innes;Why can't you listen to your brother?|Why are you always so stubborn!?
speak;Tana;You're the stubborn one, Innes!|Why can't you understand how I feel?|You're my only brother, and I have no one else on whom I can rely...|I don't want to waste our time together arguing!

speak;Tana;You don't know how much I envy Eirika and Ephraim for their closeness.|They understand one another's thoughts and feelings perfectly all the time!|Why aren't we like that?|Why do you never understand me, Innes?
speak;Innes;Tana, wait.|I don't say these things because I hate you.
speak;Tana;That's a lie!|You're always so mean to me, Innes!|You make no effort to understand how I feel.
speak;Innes;That's not true.|I'm still your brother, and I think I know you better than anyone else.
speak;Innes;Absolutely.|Do you remember the incident with the crown?

speak;Tana;Oh!|I remember.|It was when I was very little, and I lost Father's crown.|He was so angry with me.|I thought he would never stop yelling.|I was so terrified of his wrath, and I just couldn't stop crying.|I honestly believed Father would throw me in the dungeon!|But you searched the castle from top to bottom, and you found the crown.|And I remember what you told Father when you brought it back to him.|“I took your crown, Father.|I wanted to see what it would look like on my head.”|I remember how happy I was when I heard Father laughing at your words.|I thought I was the luckiest girl in the world to have a brother like you.
speak;Innes;I know how you feel better than anyone else.|And that's no lie.
speak;Tana;Innes...|I understand now why you said what you said.|But please, forgive me for being here, for not going home.|I simply wanted to be near you, my beloved brother.
speak;Innes;You win.|I'll let you stay.|But you be sure to apologize to our father when we return home.|And don't worry too much.|I'll be there with you when you do.
speak;Tana;You're the best brother anyone could have!
speak;Innes;And you are quite a handful, Sister.
